issue.title: [CF 228] How to do this?
issue.body:
I'm not sure if this is the correct place to post this but the forum seemed quite empty and i thought it better post it here than on the main curse page.
Basically i want to make an icon that shows when im in range to Skull Bash (druid interrupt) on my focus. Currently i only seem to be able to make it work on whatever it is that im actually targetting.
I have tried setting up different conditions in order to make it work as you are unable to select a target when it comes to reactive abilities.
Any suggestions would be greatly appreaciated and apologies if this is something that has already been dealth with.


> Posted by CurseForge user tomthumb112 | Imported from CurseForge issue #228 | Raw

comments.body:
Import the following string:

^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSPELLRANGE ^SName^SSkull`Bash ^SUnit^Sfocus ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^SName^SSkull`Bash ^t^N44002^^

Edited Jun 10, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks a lot for the reply, not at home to try it now but i'll give it a try the second i get on :)


> Posted by CurseForge user tomthumb112

Checked and working, just to note had to change the spell id to the actual spell id number in order for it to work correctly but still, thanks a bunch for this :)


> Posted by CurseForge user tomthumb112

Interesting... I'll have to take a look at that later.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSPELLRANGE ^SName^SSkull~`Bash ^SUnit^Sfocus ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^SName^SSkull~`Bash ^t^N44002^^

Edited Jun 11, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I know why it didn't work. The formatting of my post containing the ticket removed some characters from the names, turning it into "Skull`Bash" instead of "Skull~`Bash" ("~`" is the representation of a space here; normal spaces will get removed (I insert spaces to cause the string to not extend far to the right of the page and make you have a horizontal scroll bar))


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
